mapper.select: SELECT A.VHC_NO ,A.ROUT_ID ,A.BUS_STS ,A.PRV_PLCE_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') UPD_DTM ,A.VHC_ID ,A.GPS_X ,A.GPS_Y ,A.OPER_STS ,A.ALLOC_NO ,A.OPER_SN ,B.NODE_NM ,C.ROUT_NM FROM BRT_CUR_OPER_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST B ON A.NEXT_NODE_ID = B.NODE_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST C ON A.ROUT_ID = C.ROUT_ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(A.UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE() ORDER BY A.UPD_DTM LIMIT 20

SELECT PROV_NM ,NEWS_TITLE ,DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') UPD_DTM FROM BMS_NEWS_INFO
ORDER BY UPD_DTM LIMIT 20
SELECT SKY_COND ,TEMPC ,HUMI FROM BMS_WEAT_INFO ORDER BY UPD_DTM DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT DUSTC ,OZONEC ,NDC ,CMC ,SDC FROM BMS_ATMO_INFO ORDER BY UPD_DTM DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT VHC_NO
,CASE WHEN DSPTCH_DIV = 'DP002' THEN CASE WHEN DSPTCH_CONTS>0 THEN TIME_FORMAT(SEC_TO_TIME(DSPTCH_CONTS), '%i분 %s초 느립니다.') WHEN DSPTCH_CONTS<0 THEN TIME_FORMAT(SEC_TO_TIME(DSPTCH_CONTS), '%i분 %s초 빠릅니다.') ELSE '정상 운행중입니다.' END WHEN DSPTCH_DIV = 'DP003' THEN TIME_FORMAT(SEC_TO_TIME(DSPTCH_CONTS), '%i분 %s초 빠릅니다.') ELSE DSPTCH_CONTS END AS DSPTCH_CONTS
,DATE_FORMAT(SEND_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') SEND_DATE FROM BRT_DSPTCH_LOG WHERE DATE_FORMAT(SEND_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE() GROUP BY VHC_NO ORDER BY SEND_DATE DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT COUNT(*) INCDNT_CNT FROM BRT_INCDNT_HIS WHERE DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(*) INCDNT_RES_CNT FROM BRT_INCDNT_RES_INFO WHERE DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(*) SPEEDING_CNT FROM BRT_OPER_VIOLT_HIS WHERE DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE() AND VIOLT_TYPE = "VL003"
SELECT COUNT(*) NOSTOP_CNT FROM BRT_OPER_VIOLT_HIS WHERE DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE() AND VIOLT_TYPE = "VL004"

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') OPER_DT , A.REP_ROUT_ID , A.VHC_ID , A.UPD_DTM , A.VHC_NO , A.DRV_ID , A.COR_ID , A.ROUT_ID , A.ALLOC_NO , A.OPER_SN , A.GPS_X_RAW AS GPS_X , A.GPS_Y_RAW AS GPS_Y , A.DRV_ANGLE , A.GPS_X , A.GPS_Y , A.CUR_SPD , A.LINK_ID , A.NODE_ID , A.NODE_SN , A.OPER_STS , A.EVT_TYPE , A.EVT_DATA , A.STOP_TM , DATE_FORMAT(A.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS OCR_DTM , B.NODE_NM , B.NODE_TYPE , C.ROUT_NM , D.ORGA_NM FROM BRT_OPER_EVENT_HIS A LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST B ON A.NODE_ID = B.NODE_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST C ON A.ROUT_ID = C.ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_VOC_ORGA_INFO D ON A.EVT_DATA = D.ORGA_ID WHERE A.OPER_DT = CURDATE() ORDER BY A.OCR_DTM DESC LIMIT 20
